org.influxdata.platform

Interface TaskClient


  • public interface TaskClient
    The client of the InfluxData Platform that implement Task HTTP API endpoint.
    Author:
    Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (11/09/2018 07:54)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createTask

        @Nonnull
Task createTask(@Nonnull
                         Task task)
        Creates a new task.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to create
        Returns:
        Task created

      • createTaskCron

        @Nonnull
Task createTaskCron(@Nonnull
                             String name,
                             @Nonnull
                             String flux,
                             @Nonnull
                             String cron,
                             @Nonnull
                             String userID,
                             @Nonnull
                             String organizationID)
        Creates a new task with task repetition by cron.
        Parameters:
        name - description of the task
        flux - the Flux script to run for this task
        cron - a task repetition schedule in the form '* * * * * *'
        userID - an id of the user that owns this Task
        organizationID - an id of the organization that owns this Task
        Returns:
        Task created

      • createTaskEvery

        @Nonnull
Task createTaskEvery(@Nonnull
                              String name,
                              @Nonnull
                              String flux,
                              @Nonnull
                              String every,
                              @Nonnull
                              String userID,
                              @Nonnull
                              String organizationID)
        Creates a new task with task repetition by duration expression ("1h", "30s").
        Parameters:
        name - description of the task
        flux - the Flux script to run for this task
        every - a task repetition by duration expression
        userID - an id of the user that owns this Task
        organizationID - an id of the organization that owns this Task
        Returns:
        Task created

      • updateTask

        @Nonnull
Task updateTask(@Nonnull
                         Task task)
        Update a task. This will cancel all queued runs.
        Parameters:
        task - task update to apply
        Returns:
        task updated

      • deleteTask

        void deleteTask(@Nonnull
                Task task)
        Delete a task. Deletes a task and all associated records.
        Parameters:
        task - task to delete

      • deleteTask

        void deleteTask(@Nonnull
                String taskID)
        Delete a task. Deletes a task and all associated records.
        Parameters:
        taskID - ID of task to delete

Task findTaskByID(@Nonnull
                            String taskID)
        Retrieve an task.
        Parameters:
        taskID - ID of task to get
        Returns:
        task details

      • findTasks

        @Nonnull
List<Task> findTasks()
        Lists tasks, limit 100.
        Returns:
        A list of tasks

      • findTasksByUserID

        @Nonnull
List<Task> findTasksByUserID(@Nullable
                                      String userID)
        Lists tasks, limit 100.
        Parameters:
        userID - filter tasks to a specific user id
        Returns:
        A list of tasks

      • findTasksByOrganizationID

        @Nonnull
List<Task> findTasksByOrganizationID(@Nullable
                                              String organizationID)
        Lists tasks, limit 100.
        Parameters:
        organizationID - filter tasks to a specific organization id
        Returns:
        A list of tasks

      • findTasks

        @Nonnull
List<Task> findTasks(@Nullable
                              String afterID,
                              @Nullable
                              String userID,
                              @Nullable
                              String organizationID)
        Lists tasks, limit 100.
        Parameters:
        afterID - returns tasks after specified ID
        userID - filter tasks to a specific user id
        organizationID - filter tasks to a specific organization id
        Returns:
        A list of tasks
